name: mysql
description: This Dockerfile facilitates the setup of a MySQL container with port 3306 exposed. It utilizes the official MySQL base image and offers flexibility through customizable environment variables for configuration.

scripts.build-image: docker build -t mysql_micunext-image . || podman build -t mysql_micunext-image .
scripts.run-container: docker run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql_micunext-container -d mysql_micunext-image || podman run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql_micunext-container -d mysql_micunext-image
scripts.restart-container: docker restart mysql_micunext-container || podman restart mysql_micunext-container
scripts.stop-container: docker stop mysql_micunext-container || podman stop mysql_micunext-container
scripts.inspect-container: docker inspect mysql_micunext-container || podman inspect mysql_micunext-container
